LanguageData.AEXP_Boombat.label: boombat
LanguageData.AEXP_Boombat.description: Due to some insane experiment, these cute, fluffy rodents create a powerful fire-starting explosion when killed.
LanguageData.AEXP_Boombat_Leather.label: boombat leather
LanguageData.AEXP_Boombat_Corpse.label: boombat corpse
LanguageData.AEXP_Kangaroo.label: kangaroo
LanguageData.AEXP_Kangaroo.description: Kangaroo is a large, human-sized marsupial with strong legs and powerful arms. It's favoured by tribal hunters due to its tender meat and heat resistant leather. Kangaroos make for powerful adversaries in melee combat, and can be trained easily to become animal super-soldiers.
LanguageData.AEXP_Kangaroo_Leather.label: kangaroo leather
LanguageData.AEXP_Kangaroo_Meat.label: kangaroo meat
LanguageData.AEXP_Kangaroo_Corpse.label: kangaroo corpse
LanguageData.AEXP_Koala.label: koala
LanguageData.AEXP_Koala.description: Koalas are easily recognizable for their stout body and large, round heads with fluffy ears. They typically inhabit arid and temperate woodlands, but can rarely be seen in tropical areas. Favoured by royal families, koalas are great household animals due to their wonderful nuzzling effect.
LanguageData.AEXP_Koala_Leather.label: koala leather
LanguageData.AEXP_Koala_Meat.label: koala meat
LanguageData.AEXP_Koala_Corpse.label: koala corpse
LanguageData.AEXP_Platypus.label: platypus
LanguageData.AEXP_Platypus.description: Platypus is the sole surviving representative of its animal family. They are beaver-tailed, duck billed mammals, known for the fact that they lay eggs. It is an omnivore animal, capable of killing small rodents with it's venomous ankle spurs.
LanguageData.AEXP_Platypus.tools.4.label: head
LanguageData.AEXP_Platypus_Leather.label: platypus leather
LanguageData.AEXP_Platypus_Meat.label: platypus meat
LanguageData.AEXP_Platypus_Corpse.label: platypus corpse
